original_title: Manic Street Preachers - Forever Delayed The Greatest Hits
overview: Forever Delayed is a greatest hits album by the Manic Street Preachers, released in October 2002. The album included three singles which had never appeared on earlier albums ("Motown Junk," "Suicide Is Painless," and "The Masses Against the Classes"), the latter being one of the band's two UK #1 hits, along with "If You Tolerate This Your Children Will Be Next." This is the videos release of the album.
title: Manic Street Preachers - Forever Delayed The Greatest Hits
